headline: 4 Value Stocks Primed for Gains as Shutdown Uncertainty Fades
summary: As optimism returns after the Senate's move to end the shutdown, investors eye value stocks like GLDD, STNE, PCG and PAAS with solid cash flow strength.

headline: Is There Now an Opportunity in PG&E After California Wildfire Legislation Boosts Sentiment?
summary: Wondering whether PG&E stock is a hidden bargain or a potential value trap? You are not alone. Now is a good time to take a closer look at what you are really getting for your money. PG&E’s share price has jumped 4.1% over the past week and 4.4% over the last month. However, it is still down 17.2% year-to-date and 21.0% over the past year, despite posting gains of 44.7% over five years. Several recent headlines have brought new attention to the stock. California’s wildfire legislation and...
